page.title: 03A LARGE FARM IN COCKFIELD 2
page.content: Mr.Cornell has many machines.He has 7 tractors,1 combine harvester,1 fork lift-truck,2 seed drills,2 ploughs,1 sugar beet harvester and a sprayer.He also has 1 fertilizer spreader,4 trailers,1 ditching machine,1 flail mower,2 power harrows,1 lorry,1 corn- drier,2 rollers,1 strawbaler and a mill and mixer.Mr.Cornell employs 4 people, a stockman,a lorry/tractor driver and 2 tractor drivers.He has to get up at 7.30a.m.He has to order fuel,feeding products and spare parts.At 9a.m. he has to open post and do necessary office work.Then he goes round on an inspection of the crops and animals. Another general duty is recording rain- fall for the weather office.In the afternoons,he has to do general farm work,sometimes attending meetings or meeting reps of the farming industry. Five of us visited this farm in July.
